missionSuccessStatementOverride: Our infantry detail is securing the camp as we speak - lets hope in time to rescue Mr. Akiyama's wayward son.
badFaithStatementOverride: Well, I know we agreed on not taking risks but this was not our finest moment.
goodFaithStatementOverride: Well, I know we agreed on not taking risks but this was not our finest moment.
shortDescription:
Our objective, Asahi Akiyama, has been relocated to a reeducation facility by the invaders, the so-called Jade Falcon Clan.

We need to execute an assault on the camp, secure control of it, and liberate Mr. Akiyama. Local Jade Falcon forces are bound to respond to our incursions.

While their ECM seems to confound most of our sensors, optical observations reveal a reinforced lance around the camp and what seems like AD or guard turret emplacements around the facility.
longDescription: This is an assault-class 'Mech assignment if I ever saw one. Expect counterattacks, so use our forces wisely.

objectiveList.title: Hold The Camp While Reinforcements Arrive
Secure the Area around the Camp
objectiveList.description: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

dialogueContent.words: <color=#FF7F7F>Bandit scum dares to attack us with no warning!?</color>
<color=#FF7F7F>Garrison Star - deal with these honorless scum!</color>
So they know we are coming and have probably called for backup...
Advance towards the camp, utilizing the terrain to evade becoming a target for the entire enemy formation.
The camp is under our control, Commander, and we’re setting up perimeter defense now. Let’s see if some of the prisoners made it through...
<color=#FF7F7F>Attention - the garrison star proved inept in dealing with bandits...execute the prisoners.</color>
Can we reach the camp before they kill them?
No Sumire...I think they are trying to goad us, Commander.
We won't be able to take this one. Time to pull out, Commander.
First - we need to deal with camp garrison.
[GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
Watch out down there! We're coming in hot!
Commander, a word of warning, as long as these turrets are standing, we can't take the controll over the camp.
You need to deal with them too. As usual, avoid engaging both them and the enemy force at the same time.
Sumire is telling me that additional {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements have been spotted, so expect more contact.
